short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ILoopSee is the best free ad spy tool for the Facebook Ads Library, designed to help you find your next winning product! With…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ILoopSee is the best free ad spy tool for the Facebook Ads Library, designed to help you find your next winning product! With ILoopSee, you can filter the ad library, search, and save trending ads… all automatically!

★ Easily spy on your competitors.
★ View only the top ads and enjoy valuable features that enhance the AdLibrary.
★ Advanced filters: refine by Adsets, Page, Date, Ad Copy, Website Link…
★ Save important ads with just one click.
★ Quickly find your competitors’ ads.

Keep scrolling and searching through the AdLibrary page to discover more trending ads.
Enable Auto Load to load ads automatically.

Searching the AdLibrary can be a very time-consuming task since the official platform doesn’t provide enough filters. Before ILoopSee, we spent hours scrolling to find winning ads. Fortunately, now everything is more convenient and efficient!

With ILoopSee, you can:

Quickly filter and find the top ads from your competitors.
Get inspired faster with ads from your favorite brands.
Aggregate ads directly into your collected list using the Turbo Ad Finder feature.
While Facebook Ad Library users can only search and view current information, ILoopSee allows you to access historical data for all collected ads.

Note: Our extension does not belong to or is affiliated with the official Facebook application or website in any way. It is an independent extension, developed and maintained autonomously. All guidelines for Facebook assets and branding usage can be found here:

We hope that ILoopSee is useful for marketers or anyone looking to learn more about Facebook Ads. We welcome your feedback and are committed to continuously improving the extension by adding new features over time!
